item.title: More RTX 3060 Nicehash overclocking
item.description: This is part 2 from my previous post on RTX 3060 Nicehash overclocking settings. I donâ€™t want to edit the previous article because the content still stands to be accurate for the hash rate I achieved. However, I have since learned even more about the card and managed to improve my Nicehash quick miner hash rate by a further 10%! If you want to see the first/part1 post, you can do so here: RTX 3060 Nicehash mining overclock settings
